features.title: Advantages
front.name: Front Cage
front.description: Front cage for carrying various rolls and other bulky items on the handlebar during bike trips. Fits perfectly into the bikepacking style. Nothing to add. You can load it quite a bit, but please do not overload the handlebar. It is a control organ, after all.
front.features.2: Slots are specially made for Voile straps or similar. When you unfasten them and remove the cargo, the straps stay in place.
front.characteristics.5: Offset from handlebar to platform 45 mm
front.characteristics.8: Mounting bolts are hardened and may rust over time
little.name: Small Cage
little.description: A compact platform for your tool roll, banana, or whatever else you carry. The slots on the wings can be used to attach a pump or something similar. The cage comes with a pair of flat-head bolts designed specifically for this purpose.
little.characteristics.5: Includes several spacer washers for placing between the cage and the fork, helping to level the mounting surface on curved forks.
volume.name: Volume Cage
volume.description.1: The Volume Cage is designed for carrying tents, sleeping bags, and other elongated dry bags on your fork during bikepacking trips.
volume.description.2: The idea of this cage is not about supporting extra weight, but about conveniently securing and transporting a larger volume compared to standard cages.
volume.features.1: The slots on the wings can be used to attach a pump or other items. The cage comes with a pair of flat-head bolts.
volume.features.2: Straps can be threaded through the holes in the base if needed.
volume.characteristics.5: Offset from handlebar to platform: 45 mm
volume.characteristics.8: Includes several spacer washers for placing between the cage and the fork, helping to level the mounting surface on curved forks.
plus.name: Plus Cage
plus.description.1: Our cage can be used for bike touring, bikepacking, or everyday commuting.
plus.description.2: It’s primarily designed for bottles like Nalgene, cans of stew (just kidding), or any other solid items.
plus.features.1: You can mount a pump using the slots on the wings. The cage comes with a pair of flat-head bolts for that purpose.
plus.features.2: If needed, you can also attach the cage to the frame by its wings.
plus.fun_features.1: Opener version — yes, it has a built-in bottle opener.
plus.fun_features.2: Non-opener version — the bottom has holes for creative types: you can attach, for example, a flashlight or a spare tube.
plus.characteristics.6: Includes several spacer washers for mounting between the cage and the fork to align the cage on curved fork legs.
